pkgmetadata.longdescription: ====Cats====It brings more cats to your life!-------Install-------.. code-block :: pip install catsIf you want to run parsers you need Python 3.5 or better and install special requirements:.. code-block :: pip install 'cats[parser]'----------How to use----------You can do it!.. code-block :: $ cats ,-~-, ,-~~~~-, /\ /\ (\ / ,-, \ ,' ', / ~~ \ \'-' / \ \ / _ # <0 0> \ '--' \ \/ .''. # = Y =/ \ / \ \ `#-..!.-' \ \ \ `\ \\ ) /> / \ \\ / /`/ /`__ \ \\__ jgs (____)))_))) \__)))-------Sources-------1. https://user.xmission.com/~emailbox/ascii_cats.htm2. http://www.asciiworld.com/-Cats-.html3. ...to be continued.
